content: Yi, the last thing I would say is, we’ve seen some countries like the UK, that at one point was doing all molecular testing and they came out and said now we’re going to switch and start doing all rapid immuno. So that’s why we basically said, you had a $15 million beat or so in the first quarter kind of versus what people thought and we – we’ve kind of guided towards, it’d be similar type of performance in the second quarter versus that.
